title: AI editorial puts spotlight on disclosure
text: A New Zealand Herald editorial written with the help of artificial intelligence has raised questions about how our media should use the technology for journalism.

title: AI is coming for your playlist
text: It's been called a revolution as big as electricity or the motorcar - artificial intelligence is changing the creation of music.

title: When an algorithm is your boss
text: There's a new cohort of workers using platforms powered by artificial intelligence to get work, but regulation over the gig economy is lagging.
